item.title: ksmirnovk: Stata Program for Performing a k-sample Kolmogorov-Smirnov Test
item.description: Here is some Stata code I produced back in 2017. A colleague asked how to perform a k-sample Kolmogorov-Smirnov test in Stata, and I was surprised to find that it is not widely implemented. I was more surpised to discover that such a test was developed back in 1959 by J Kiefer. I thought it would be straightforward to implement the test given Kiefer’s formula–all we need is a test statistic and and a CDF.
